FuncDef:
The apply tag command sets a tag for a route.
The undo apply tag command cancels the setting. The apply tag command sets a tag for a route. The undo apply tag command cancels the setting. By default, no tag is set for routes.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the tag of routes. Routes can be tagged as required. You can set the same tag for routes of the same type. Then, routes can be flexibly controlled and managed through tags in the route-policy.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 4294967295.

ExtraInfo: To set the same tag for the routes that match the filtering conditions specified in the if-match clause, run the apply tag command.
